column1: 17405,Annihilation: Conquest (2007) #2,2,31999,86,"The sci-fi event of the year continues here! The Big Bad behind the entire saga was revealed on the last page of last issue - but what does this fan-fave villain want? And what does it have to do with the surprise ally that our heroes have also recently found? Plus: Who survived the STAR-LORD series to fight on here? And what about the motley crew led by Ronan? The titanic team of Andy Lanning & Dan Abnett (NOVA) and Tom Raney (ULTIMATE X-MEN) deliver the answers fast and furious in this issue!,2007,8
